text: The men's shot put event at the 1996 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Sydney, Australia, at International Athletic Centre on 23 and 25 August. A 7257g (Senior implement) shot was used. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Ralf Bartels ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Justin ==Participation== According to an unofficial count, 23 athletes from 19 countries participated in the event. ==References== Shot put Category:Shot put at the World Athletics U20 Championships
